'''Mr. Nine''' is the author of "[[Legend of the Shattered Halberd]]" and "[[Flowers for Princess Fischl]]." His works are highly popular, and [[Fischl]] based her persona on the titular character of "Flowers for Princess Fischl."<ref>{{Ref/CS|Fischl|Character Story 3}}</ref>

==Trivia==
*"Nine" is his real name and not a pen name.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Octave of the Maushiro}}</ref>
